subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: Contribute to the strengthening of environmental control actions at the federal level, through implementation, structuring and functioning of the Federal Centre for Environmental Licensing (CELAF) as a national reference center in the area of ​​environmental licensing.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/02/011-Environmental Licen
